channel.title: Timed Messages
channel.description: Can someone please help me out? I am trying to get a code for my 317 Allstar source that makes it so that every 30-45 minutes a message is sent to everyone that says something. Can someone please give me that code? Thank you.

item.title: Timed Messages
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“GodexCAB, post:1, topic:519625”]Can someone please help me out? I am trying to get a code for my 317 Allstar source that makes it so that every 30-45 minutes a message is sent to everyone that says something. Can someone please give me that code?
Thank you.[/quote]Do you have a task manager? if not you should get one… once you have the task manager make a timer with it that runs in the server not in every player, (main method) and then loop through the playerhandler and send the message

Read full topic

item.title: Timed Messages
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“iNoltScape, post:2, topic:519625”]“server listening to port on 0.0.0.0:43954”

how to change to my server ip?[/quote]

Why would you ask a question that has nothing to do with what i am posting about?

Read full topic
